text: Mychael Knight, a fashion designer who was a finalist on the popular competition show “ Project Runway, ” died on Tuesday near Atlanta. He was 39. His death was announced by Jerris Madison, a friend and the editor of Obvious, a fashion publication. He did not specify the cause, but Mr. Knight had written on social media about his struggle with irritable bowel syndrome. Mr. Knight, in 2006, appeared on Season 3 of “ Project Runway, ” which was on the Bravo cable channel at the time, and finished fourth. He returned for “ Project Runway All Stars ” on Lifetime in 2013, finishing eighth. Image Mychael Knight at the Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs in 2005. Credit Brian Bohannon / Associated Press.
